info.name: KPIs - Run API-Management indexing (Main)
info.description: Flow which indexes API management KPIs. This flow checks, makes sure that the current API builder is responsible for indexing, reads the API manager configuration and starts a sub-flow.

parameters.name: code
parameters.metaDescription: A JavaScript function body. Supports `await` and returning promises. `data` is the value of the Data parameter. `logger` is the API Builder logger. See the docs for more info: https://docs.axway.com/bundle/API_Builder_4x_allOS_en/page/javascript_flow-node.html

parameters.name: delay
parameters.metaDescription: The length of delay, in milliseconds.

parameters.name: index
parameters.metaDescription: Comma-separated list or wildcard expression of index names used to limit the request.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.metaDescription: A comma-separated list of <field>:<direction> pairs.

parameters.name: allow_no_indices
parameters.metaDescription: If true, the request does not return an error if a wildcard expression or _all value retrieves only missing or closed indices. This parameter also applies to index aliases that point to a missing or closed index.

parameters.name: size
parameters.metaDescription: Defines the number of hits to return. Defaults to 10.

parameters.name: _source
parameters.metaDescription: True or false to return the _source field or not, or a list of fields to return.

parameters.name: index
parameters.metaDescription: The name of the index

parameters.name: alias
parameters.metaDescription: The alias for the index. If an index configuration is given, this alias name is merged into it. Please note, that the index- and alias-name must be different.

parameters.name: indexTemplate
parameters.metaDescription: If given, the index will only be created if the index-template already exists.

parameters.name: id
parameters.metaDescription: The ID of a previously configured `Flow Listener`.

parameters.name: items
parameters.metaDescription: An array of input items where each item will be passed as request data when invoking the flow.

parameters.name: concurrency
parameters.metaDescription: By default, items in the Items array are processed concurrently in chunks of 10.  This value can be set to 0 to process all items in Items concurrently, or set to 1 to disable concurrency, or set to a value greater-than 1 to provide a throttling mechanism so as to not overwhelm a backend.

parameters.name: breakOnError
parameters.metaDescription: If true, this will break out of the flow invocation loop when the first error occurs. When Concurrency is not set to 1, all remaining requests currently being executed will be processed before breaking.

parameters.name: value
parameters.metaDescription: The value to test input against.

parameters.name: source
parameters.metaDescription: The input to test.

parameters.name: message
parameters.value: "API-Builder hostname does not match to last KPI-Document. Another builder is indexing Management KPIs."
parameters.metaDescription: The log message.

parameters.name: level
parameters.metaDescription: The desired log level of the output logs.

parameters.name: data
parameters.metaDescription: The value to apply as the `data` argument of the JavaScript code. For objects and arrays, `data` is passed by reference.
